entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.5°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
